item.description:
"I look for truth and find that I get damned."

 


"But what is truth?
Is truth a changing law?
We both have truths.
Are mine the same as yours?"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


Come Inquisitives! Join us for a lively, but moderated, discussion of truth, beliefs, principles and compromise.

Can truth be determined objectively? If not, how do go about finding truth?

How should we evaluate my claim that I'm right? Or your differing claim of what is right? Can we both be right?

Can truths be true, but in conflict with each other? What value is there in compromising with an opposition that, in your view, is wrong?

Our discussion will be in two parts. We'll start out with some specific questions and scenarios. For the second part, we'll have a more free ranging discussion.

As always, we expect participants to argue ideas, but respect that Inquisitives come from many paths, beliefs, and lessons learned. Please respect all speakers. Come to have to fun, and maybe learn something from what others bring to the evening. We'll go out after the discussion for drinks and to socialize.

 

 

 


Quotes courtesy of Tim Rice.

Note: This event's date subject to change.
item.how_to_find_us: Find us at the large table all the way in back.
item.name: What is truth?
